#SSH Debug Script file # Minimum requirement: Edit the 'Host' below, and make sure your remote ssh host has mono installed, and sshd.
# This file is executed sequentially, prior to debugging. # To execute console commands, use the prefix: # '<' or '&<' for local synchronous or asynchronous operation. # '>' or '&>' for remote synchronous or asynchronous operation. # 's>' for synchronous shell input/output.
# Remember: you may want to add this file to your repository ignore file. (*.xft.ssh)
Name = My Remote Host Host = user@host[:port] WorkingDir = ~ PrivateKeyFile =
TerminalFont Monospace 10 TerminalRows 30; TerminalCols 120;
LocalTunnelPort 8000 RemoteTunnelPort 12345
#Copy executable & debug file to remote. scp-copy $[exe-path] $[mdb-path]
StartTunnel
#Start remote application, with debug listener. &>mono --debug --debugger-agent=transport=dt_socket,address=localhost:$[RemoteTunnelPort],server=y,suspend=y $[exe-file]
